level.text: Each approved MTS shall be submitted for renewal of its approval at least sixty (60) days prior to the expiration of the approval, unless the Office provides otherwise in writing. The procedures applicable to new applications shall apply to renewal applications, except as otherwise required by the Office.
An approval shall continue in force and effect beyond its expiration period during such time as an application for re-approval is pending in proper form.
Renewal of MTS approval shall require that the MTS be in compliance with all applicable provisions of this title, and other applicable laws in effect at the time renewal is sought.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 6993 (May 17, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 10975 (July 26, 2013).
